name: The Doors of Perspective
description:
Controls:
WASD - Movement
Mouse - Camera
Space - Jump
E - Open the door

Didn't have much time this week because I was in the process of moving, but I managed to get this little prototype together.  It's pretty unpolished (lack of start/exit/restart) but you get the gist.

The PostProcessing shader doesn't seem to work that well in the builds compared to in the editor so idk what that's about.

Used ScriptableObjectArchitecture for some events.
